name: Caveman Conquest
description:
Conquer the stone age one tile at a time!

Caveman Conquest is a prehistoric strategy game where the goal is to either have the most tiles claimed or be the last one standing at the end up the turn limit.

Expand your territory by claiming new tiles, research thrilling new scientific advances to unlock new, deadlier units, and send out your mighty army to squash the other tribes!

Featuring the wonderful musical works of Jonathan Geer, composer behind Owlboy and the Cook, Serve, Delicious! series! (https://www.jonathangeer.com/)

Download the OST here: https://www.jonathangeer.com/copy-of-music (Scroll all the way down)

CONTROLS

  • Move Camera: Middle Mouse / WASD
  • Zoom Camera: Scroll Wheel / Q and E / Page Up and Page Down
  • Select Unit: Left Click Friendly Unit
  • Move Unit: Right Click Target Tile
  • Inspect Unit: Left Alt + Click on Unit (Friendly or Enemy)
  • Inspect Tile Left Ctrl + Click (Friendly or Enemy)

Created by:

  • David Green
  • Mark Green
  • Kevin Samsoe
  • Patrick Sherbondy
